oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-03-02 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 2, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer), guest performer Jimmy C. Newman, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ernest Tubb; Rod Brasfield; Jimmy C. Newman; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ernest Tubb -- You Nearly Lose Your Mind (Ernest Tubb) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Jimmy Newman -- I've Got You On My Mind (Jimmy C. Newman) -- Prince Albert commercial (Ernest Tubb, Rod Brasfield) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Tommy Jackson -- Turkey In The Straw (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Ernest Tubb talks -- God's Eyes (Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Chet Atkins -- Wildwood Flower (Chet Atkins) -- Ernest Tubb introduces June Carter
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jackson, Tommy; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Newman, Jimmy C.; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Byrd, Billy
